name: Music Trails
description:
Music Trails is a rythm game based on your favourite music! Just choose a song from your PC and the game will automatically generate the level!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

PHOTOSENSITIVE SEIZURE WARNING

This game contains a lot of flash things. STOP PLAYING THE GAME IF YOU EXPERIENCE LIGHTHEADEDNESS, 

ALTERED VISION, EYE OR FACE TWITCHING, JERKING OF ARMS OR LEGS

If you already had seizures or epilepsy, consult a doctor before playing.
